resources.string: Graphic Era Hill University is a private university located in Dehradun, Uttrakhand. It was set up under the foundation of the Graphic Era Education Society (GEES) in 1996 as a non profit organization. The university has got recognition from University Grants Commission (UGC) and is a member of Association of Indian Universities (AIU). It has also been accredited by NAAC.Graphic Era Hill university, Dehradun offers different undergraduate, post graduate and diploma courses in computer applications, management, humanities, commerce and law etc
